column1: Smoque BBQ////A friend and I tried nearly all the meat varieties they have - chopped brisket
column4: pulled pork.  Chopped brisket (as close as you could get to burnt ends) and pulled pork were my favorite
column5: and I also liked that they gave you both sweet sauce and vinegary sauce.  We tried many of the sides too: fries (huge portion!)
column9: not creamy (for those of you who care).
